# athenahealth AI & Ambient Documentation Research

*Research Date: November 2025*

---

## Executive Summary

athenahealth is taking a **dual-track approach** to AI-powered ambient documentation:
1. **Partner Integration Strategy** ("Choose Your Player") - Offering multiple third-party ambient AI vendors through Ambient Notes
2. **Native Development** - Building athenaAmbient, a fully integrated ambient scribe included at no additional cost (launching February 2026)

The company serves **170,000+ providers** primarily in the ambulatory/physician practice market and differentiates through its cloud-native architecture and open ecosystem approach.

---

## 1. AI Product Offerings

### Ambient Notes (Current - GA)
**Launch:** October 2024 (limited release), Early 2025 (general availability)

athenahealth's flagship ambient documentation product that uniquely supports **multiple AI-powered ambient models simultaneously**.

**Key Features:**
- Embeds ambient listening and generative AI directly into athenaOne EHR
- Clinicians can switch seamlessly between industry-leading models
- Automatically generates comprehensive medical notes during patient encounters
- Supports specialty-specific workflows
- 160,000+ clinicians have access

**Integrated Partners:**
| Partner | Status | Key Stats |
|---------|--------|-----------|
| Suki AI | GA (May 2025) | 60,000+ encounters, 72% faster notes, 9X ROI Year 1 |
| iScribe AI | GA (2025) | 74,000+ encounters, 6+ hrs/week saved |
| Abridge | Alpha (Spring 2025) | Best in KLAS 2025, scaled rollout Summer 2025 |

**Unique Differentiator:** Only EHR that supports multiple AI ambient models simultaneously with seamless switching.

### athenaAmbient (Coming February 2026)
**Status:** User testing begins February 2026

Native ambient digital scribe built **inside** athenaOne as part of the new AI-native clinical encounter experience.

**Capabilities:**
- Automates draft notes, diagnoses, and prescriptions
- Provides real-time suggestions during encounters
- Ensures care gaps are addressed
- Documentation ready seconds after visit completion
- Surfaces relevant insights at moment of care

**Key Differentiators:**
- **No Additional Cost** - Included in core athenaOne fee
- **Zero Implementation Work** - Automatically added to clinician workflows
- **Fully Integrated** - Native to EHR, not bolted on

**CEO Quote (Bob Segert):** "For our customers who today get ambient notes through a partner or through one of our other solutions, this will all be embedded in the core athenaOne fee and will not be at any incremental charge... this will be a really big economic advantage for those customers."

### Sage (AI Clinical Copilot)
**Status:** Limited Release (Current)

AI-driven clinical assistant embedded in athenaOne.

**Capabilities:**
- "Understands" full patient chart
- Answers clinical questions about individual patient medical history
- "Changes since last visit" - chronological format of important events/results
- "What to know today" - concise visit summary with clinical decision support

### Other AI Capabilities

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| ChartSync | External data integration for comprehensive patient view |
| AI-Powered Order Suggestions | Drafts orders based on clinical conversation |
| Diagnosis Suggestions | AI-generated diagnostic recommendations |
| Revenue Cycle AI | Medical coding, prior authorization support (roadmap) |

---

## 2. Partner Integrations

### Abridge Partnership

**Announced:** February 2025
**Status:** Alpha testing Spring 2025, scaled rollout Summer 2025

**Partnership Details:**
- Integrates Abridge's ambient AI directly within athenaOne
- Real-time clinical documentation without interrupting care flow
- Available to 160,000+ clinicians on athenahealth network

**Why Abridge:**
- Best in KLAS 2025 for Ambient AI
- $2.75B valuation (Series D, $250M raise)
- 150+ health system deployments

**Sources:**
- [athenahealth Press Release](https://www.athenahealth.com/press-releases/athenahealth-and-abridge-partner)
- [Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20250225292481/en/athenahealth-and-Abridge-Partner-to-Deliver-AI-Designed-for-the-Needs-of-Ambulatory-Care-Practices)

### Suki AI Partnership

**Partnership Duration:** 7+ years via Marketplace
**Status:** General Availability (May 2025)

**Integration Details:**
- First ambient AI partner with GA for entire athenahealth customer base
- 2,000+ clinicians on Marketplace offering
- 2M+ clinical encounters generated
- Integration time: ~5 business days

**Technical Integration:**
- Bi-directional sync between Suki and athenaOne
- Pre-chart in athenaOne, finish in Suki (or vice versa)
- Note content stays in sync between systems

**Outcomes:**
- 72% faster note completion
- 40% documentation time reduction
- 12% increase in encounter volume
- 19% reduction in claims denial rates
- ~$47,000 incremental revenue per physician/year

**Sources:**
- [Suki Press Release](https://www.suki.ai/news/suki-and-athenahealth-expand-partnership-with-general-availability-of-ambient-notes-using-sukis-ambient-technology/)
- [athenahealth Marketplace](https://marketplace.athenahealth.com/product/suki-ai)

### iScribe AI Partnership

**Partnership Since:** 2017
**Status:** Expanding availability

**Integration Details:**
- 2,000+ clinicians supported
- Millions of clinical encounters across 45+ specialties
- 74,000+ encounters in Ambient Notes beta

**Outcomes:**
- Up to 6+ hours saved per week (certain specialties like orthopedic surgery)
- Faster encounter close rates
- Improved billing accuracy

**Sources:**
- [iScribeHealth Press Release](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/iscribehealth-and-athenahealth-expand-partnership-to-bring-ambient-notes-to-more-clinicians-nationwide-302550907.html)

### Nabla Partnership

**Joined Marketplace:** September 2024 (among first ambient AI providers)
**Status:** Active in Marketplace

**Results (First Year):**
- 30+ provider groups adopted
- 24% faster documentation completion
- Eliminated after-hours charting

**Sources:**
- [Nabla Press Release](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/30-provider-groups-adopt-nablas-ambient-ai-through-athenahealth-in-first-year-302579391.html)

## 3. KLAS Research & Ratings

### athenahealth Awards

| Award | Year |
|-------|------|
| Best in KLAS - Overall Independent Physician Practice Suite | 2024, 2025 |
| Best in KLAS - Ambulatory EHR (11-75 physicians) | 2025 |
| Best in KLAS - Practice Management (11-75 physicians) | 2025 |
| KLAS Points of Light - Prior Authorization | 2024 |

### Partner KLAS Ratings

| Partner | KLAS Recognition | Score |
|---------|-----------------|-------|
| Abridge | **Best in KLAS 2025 - Ambient AI** | #1 in category |
| Suki AI | KLAS Spotlight Report 2024 | 93.2 overall performance |
| Ambience Healthcare | KLAS Spotlight Report 2024 | 97.7% (highest in category) |

**Note:** Ambience Healthcare is not currently an athenahealth partner but has validated integrations with athenahealth.

**KLAS Market Context:**
- KLAS validates 6 vendors in ambient speech market: Abridge, Ambience Healthcare, DeepScribe, Microsoft/Nuance, Nabla, Suki
- Abridge and Microsoft recognized for Epic Workshop partnership
- Suki and Nabla noted for EHR-agnostic approach

**Sources:**
- [Abridge Best in KLAS](https://www.abridge.com/blog/best-in-klas-2025)
- [Suki KLAS Report](https://www.suki.ai/news/suki-assistant-receives-93-2-overall-performance-score-in-2024-klas-spotlight-report/)

---

## 4. Technology Approach

### Native vs. Partner Strategy

**Current State (2024-2025):**
- Primary approach: Partner integrations through Ambient Notes
- Open ecosystem philosophy - "choose your player"
- 10+ AI scribes available through Marketplace

**Future State (2026+):**
- athenaAmbient as native, no-cost option
- Partners continue for specialized needs
- Hybrid model: Native + Partner ecosystem

### Integration Architecture

| Aspect | Approach |
|--------|----------|
| Deployment | Cloud-native (single-instance SaaS) |
| Integration | Embedded within athenaOne workflow |
| Data Exchange | FHIR, Carequality, CommonWell |
| Partner Integration | Marketplace + deep API integration |

### Competitive Technology Positioning

**vs. Epic:**
- athenahealth: Open ecosystem, partner choice
- Epic: Building native "Art for Clinicians" (announced August 2025)
- athenahealth connectivity: 100% Epic via Carequality/CommonWell

**vs. Oracle/Cerner:**
- athenahealth: Cloud-native from inception
- Oracle: Next-gen EHR with AI launched 2024
- athenahealth connectivity: 66% Cerner via data exchange networks

**Sources:**
- [Fierce Healthcare](https://www.fiercehealthcare.com/health-tech/athenahealth-unveils-ai-upgrades-ehr-enhance-clinical-summaries-interoperability-and)

---

## 5. Customer Adoption

### Overall AI Adoption Statistics

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Clinicians with Ambient Notes access | 160,000+ |
| Total providers on athenahealth | 170,000+ |
| AI usage increase (clinical documentation) | 68% of physicians increased |
| Large practice AI adoption (20+ physicians) | 49% |
| Small/medium practice AI adoption | 22-23% |

### Customer Success Stories

**Privia Health**
- Major athenahealth customer
- Selected Ambient Notes for documentation automation
- CTO Chris Voigt: "At Privia, we're always looking for technology to make our doctors' lives easier"
- Outcome: Improved patient focus, high-quality documentation

**Springfield Clinic (Dr. Janelle Smith)**
- Automated clinical documentation
- Saved after-hours time
- Improved capture of encounters for clinical and billing purposes

**Orthopedic Practice (Anonymous)**
- 40% reduction in documentation time using ambient AI

### Adoption Barriers

**Physician Sentiment (athenahealth Survey, 1,000+ physicians):**
- 48% identified improved clinical documentation/transcription as most valuable AI use case
- 46% identified reduced administrative burden as top priority
- Over 90% experience regular burnout (2023 survey)

**Sources:**
- [athenahealth Customer Success](https://www.athenahealth.com/resources/customer-success/why-privia-health-chose-athenahealths-ambient-notes)
- [Mobi Health News](https://www.mobihealthnews.com/news/qa-athenahealth-its-ai-enabled-products-and-himss25)

---

## 6. Competitive Positioning

### Market Position

| Factor | athenahealth Position |
|--------|----------------------|
| Target Market | Ambulatory practices, independent physicians |
| Market Segment | Small to mid-sized practices |
| Pricing | ~$449/mo/provider (affordable tier) |
| Deployment | Cloud-only SaaS |
| Differentiator | Open ecosystem, partner flexibility |

### Competitive Comparison

| Vendor | AI Strategy | Integration | Cost Model |
|--------|-------------|-------------|------------|
| **athenahealth** | Multi-partner + Native (2026) | Deep athenaOne embedding | athenaAmbient free; partners ~$100-400/mo |
| **Epic** | Native "Art for Clinicians" + partners | Embedded in Epic | TBD |
| **Oracle/Cerner** | Native AI + voice | Oracle Health integrated | Enterprise pricing |
| **Microsoft/Nuance** | DAX Copilot (dominant) | 200+ EHRs | $500-700/mo |

### Strategic Advantages

1. **Partner Flexibility** - Only EHR with multiple simultaneous ambient AI options
2. **No-Cost Native Option** - athenaAmbient included in subscription (2026)
3. **Zero Implementation** - Auto-enabled for clinicians
4. **Cloud-Native** - True SaaS, automatic updates
5. **Network Effects** - 170,000+ provider network

### Strategic Challenges

1. **Late Native Entry** - athenaAmbient launches after competitors
2. **Ambulatory Focus** - Limited inpatient presence vs. Epic/Oracle
3. **Enterprise Gap** - Smaller than Epic/Oracle in large health systems
4. **Partner Dependency** - Current reliance on Abridge/Suki while building native

---

## 7. 2025-2026 Roadmap

### Confirmed Releases

| Timeline | Product/Feature | Details |
|----------|-----------------|---------|
| **May 2025** | Suki GA | First ambient partner with full GA |
| **Summer 2025** | Abridge scaled rollout | Completing alpha/beta |
| **February 2026** | athenaAmbient user testing | Native ambient scribe begins testing |
| **H1 2026** | AI-Native Clinical Encounter | Full AI-native EHR experience testing |

### Announced AI-Native Clinical Encounter Features

**Core Components:**
- athenaAmbient (ambient scribe)
- Sage (clinical copilot)
- Real-time clinical intelligence
- Automated draft notes, orders, diagnoses

**User Experience Changes:**
- Anticipates clinician needs
- Surfaces relevant insights at moment of care
- Documentation ready seconds after visit
- Care gap identification

### Broader AI Roadmap

**Confirmed Directions:**
- Medical coding automation
- Prior authorization AI
- Revenue cycle support
- Clinical decision support expansion

**CEO Vision (Bob Segert):** "This is not a fad, AI. This is something that's needed. You must embrace it."

**Sources:**
- [Business Wire - AI-Native Encounter](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20251104083540/en/athenahealths-AI-native-Clinical-Encounter-Transforms-the-EHR-into-a-Real-Time-Clinical-Intelligence-Partner)
- [HIT Consultant](https://hitconsultant.net/2025/11/04/athenahealth-unveils-ai-native-clinical-encounter-to-reimagine-the-future-of-ehrs/)
- [Newsweek](https://www.newsweek.com/athenahealth-throws-its-hat-in-ambient-scribe-ai-assistant-rings-access-health-10991353)

---

## 8. Pricing Information

### Ambient Notes (Partner Solutions)

| Partner | Estimated Cost |
|---------|---------------|
| Suki AI | ~$299-399/provider/month |
| Abridge | ~$100-400/provider/month |
| iScribe AI | Competitive with above |

**Industry Context:** AI scribe costs have fallen from ~$2,000/month to $100-400/month per provider.

### athenaAmbient (2026)

- **Pricing:** Included in athenaOne subscription at no additional cost
- **Economic Advantage:** Significant savings vs. partner solutions

### athenaOne Base Pricing

- Starting at ~$449/month/provider
- Includes EHR, Practice Management, Revenue Cycle Management

---

## 9. Summary Assessment

### Strengths

- **Unique partner flexibility** with "choose your player" approach
- **Strong KLAS ratings** for core EHR
- **Best-in-class partners** (Abridge #1 KLAS, Suki 93.2 score)
- **No-cost native option** coming 2026
- **Cloud-native architecture** enables rapid updates
- **Large ambulatory footprint** (170,000+ providers)

### Weaknesses

- **Native AI late to market** vs. Epic/Nuance
- **Ambulatory-focused** - limited inpatient presence
- **Partner dependency** until athenaAmbient matures
- **Smaller enterprise presence** than Epic/Oracle

### Opportunities

- **athenaAmbient differentiation** on zero cost/zero implementation
- **Revenue cycle AI** expansion
- **Network effects** from large provider base
- **Partner ecosystem** for specialized needs

### Threats

- **Epic native AI** ("Art for Clinicians") may reduce partner demand
- **Microsoft/Nuance dominance** in enterprise
- **Consolidation pressure** in EHR market
- **Partner competition** if athenaAmbient succeeds
